xyz.izaak.radon.world

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • xyz.izaak.radon.math.MatrixTransformable
      • xyz.izaak.radon.world.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transformable

    public class Entity
extends MatrixTransformable
    Any object within a Scene. Most Entity objects will have a set of Primitive objects which comprise its physical appearance, as well as a single CollisionShape and some constant values which govern the way this Entity interacts kinematically with other Entities in the scene.

      A Builder class for Entity objects

    • Constructor Detail

      • Entity

        public Entity(float mass,
              float restitution,
              float friction)
        Constructs a new entity object
        Parameters:
        mass - the resistance of this object to acceleration in response to force
        restitution - the elasticity of this object in collision (must be between 0 and 1)
        friction - the resistance of this object to sliding against other objects

        public void addPrimitives(Primitive... primitives)
        Add Primitives to this object, which comprise its visual appearance
        Parameters:

      • setCollisionShape

        public void setCollisionShape(com.bulletphysics.collision.shapes.CollisionShape collisionShape)
        Add a CollisionShape to this object, so that it can be involved in a JBullet kinematic simulation
        Parameters:
        collisionShape - the JBullet CollisionShape object which represents this entity in a kinematic simulation

      • getMass

        public float getMass()
        Returns:
        the resistance of this object to acceleration in response to force

      • getRestitution

        public float getRestitution()
        Returns:
        elasticity of this object in collision, on a scale from 0 (inelastic) to 1 (elastic)

      • getFriction

        public float getFriction()
        Returns:
        the resistance of this object to sliding against other objects
